spec.config:
log:
  level: debug
domains:
  pente:
    plugin:
      type: jar
      library: /app/domains/pente.jar
      class: io.kaleido.paladin.pente.domain.PenteDomain
    registryAddress: {{ .penteRegistryAddress }}
  noto:
    plugin:
      type: c-shared
      library: /app/domains/libnoto
    registryAddress: {{ .notoRegistryAddress }}
